metadata.title: CVE-2017-11576 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
FontForge 20161012 does not ensure a positive size in a weight vectormemcpy call in readcfftopdict (parsettf.c) resulting in DoS via a craftedotf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11576` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fontforge - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1
fontforge-common - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1
fontforge-nox - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1
libfontforge1 - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1
libgdraw4 - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1
python-fontforge - 20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fontforge package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120731.b-7.1ubuntu0.1').
